pkgmetadata.longdescription: Applied Statistical Time Series Analysis // Data sets and scripts to accompany Time Series Analysis and Its Applications: With R Examples (4th ed), by R.H. Shumway and D.S. Stoffer. Springer Texts in Statistics, 2017, DOI:10.1007/978-3-319-52452-8, and Time Series: A Data Analysis Approach Using R. Chapman-Hall, 2019, DOI:10.1201/9780429273285.
